Package com.appriskgame.services

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectedGraph
    This Class containing the method to check whether a map is a connected graph or not
    FortificationPhase
    This class is for the fortification phase of the game.
    MapOperations
    The MapOperations class is for loading the contents with Continents, respective Countries and also for getting the map details for other classes
    MapValidation
    This class is used to check the format of List of continents, List of countries, adjacency between countries which are present in the uploaded file and validate the map.
    ReinforcementPhase
    Reinforcement has methods required for reinforcing the armies to each player in their turn.
    RoundRobinAllocator
    This class is used to iterate the Players Turns.
    StartupPhase
    This class contains methods which will take the input to add or remove players , Populate countries to players randomly , to allocate armies to the players initially and then place the remaining armies in round robin fashion and includes to initialize the reinforcement phase
